about_the_game:
"Are you brave enough to save yourself?"

A great scourge of devils are the Crestliches and she is one of them. Adena Krieger is an unlikely protagonist that fights fate! Enter an uncertain world which much like your own armour looks to imprison you. Forces of good and evil look to take advantage of your latent powers all while the menace of your kin lurks in the shadows to devour you whole. Learn about your curse, forge bonds and free yourself from the ties that bind you!

Adapt. Overcome. Transform your armour and inherit new roles in a dynamic, turn based battle system. Inherit the role of a Cannoneer with spread damage or go in for the kill as a covert Assassin. Your weapon evolves alongside your Armour, so you can strike back right away!

Ferocious Enemies seek to challenge you on your journey towards an uncertain fate. Some are even far bigger than you. What strategy will you employ to reduce their number?

content_descriptors.notes: The game starts out in a bleak, dystopian setting where the walls and floor are made of both metal and kiseral, a hivelike force that creates the environment. The dungeon in question is named the "Corpse Tower" - a reference to the dead in the visage of a tree.
